name: Lunges
how_to_perform:
1. Stand with your feet hip-width apart, take a large step forward with one foot.
2. Keep your back straight and engage your core muscles by pulling your belly button towards your spine.
3. Lower your body down until your back knee is almost touching the ground, keep your front leg in line with your hips.
4. Push through the sole of your front foot to return to standing, bring the other leg forward and repeat the movement.
5. Alternate legs throughout the exercise.
short_summary: Lunges are a lower body exercise that primarily works quadriceps, hamstrings, glutes, and calves.
